channel.description: Blood and shadow grimoire addressed to me and for my use.

item.title: Where
item.dc:creator: pathogenicus
item.description:
Exporation of my innerspace. “Behold, thou lovest truth in the inward affections: therefore hast thou taught me wisdom in the secret of mine heart.” – Psalm 51:6 “Create in me a clean heart, O God, and renew a right spirit within me.Cast me not away from thy presence, and take not thine holy Spirit from […]

The post Where appeared first on Pathogenicus Work.

item.title: Synthesis
item.dc:creator: pathogenicus
item.description:
Guidance on using synthesis for my catalystic meditations and intentional visions of or from my innerspace and calling up or out narratives and narration. Drilling abysmal wells within my void. My thesis and antithesis synthesized producing my altered thesis. Freedom from celestial influences. Becoming other. Abandoning my illusion and ill sickly decease called “self”. Explanations […]

The post Synthesis appeared first on Pathogenicus Work.

item.title: There
item.dc:creator: pathogenicus
item.description:
Pathogenicus serves as my structure that binds all my intentions and offers my essential context in which I interpret narrative synthesis. Incorporating significant performance influences facilitates infusion of my overarching narrative with a particular style and enhances coherence of my narrative. The period between historical narratives provides a generalized representation of my innerspace (inner firmament) […]

The post There appeared first on Pathogenicus Work.

item.title: Here
item.dc:creator: pathogenicus
item.description:
Narrative synthesis involves generating melded associations and expanding or contracting upon such to establish pathogenicus clusters of potential narratives and character weavings- my mechanism or technique for character narration networking. I can employ synthesis at an pathogenicus [intersection] of my narrative or even later on, and it is particularly useful when I may struggle with […]
